Package hexanome.fourteen.server.model.board

Class GameBoard

java.lang.Object
hexanome.fourteen.server.model.board.GameBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
eu.kartoffelquadrat.asyncrestlib.BroadcastContent
public final class GameBoard extends Object implements eu.kartoffelquadrat.asyncrestlib.BroadcastContent
Game Board. We might have to include a different class, GameBoard, with no functionality, and only the necessary information to send to the clients (We'll see). If so this might be true for more than just this class.
